scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--require ts-node/register/transpile-only --require tsconfig-paths/register" medusa develop
scripts.start: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--require ts-node/register/transpile-only --require tsconfig-paths/register" medusa start
scripts.migrate: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--require ts-node/register/transpile-only --require tsconfig-paths/register" medusa migrations run
scripts.seed: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--require ts-node/register/transpile-only --require tsconfig-paths/register" medusa seed -f ./data/seed.json
scripts.seed:admin: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--require ts-node/register/transpile-only --require tsconfig-paths/register" medusa user -e admin@example.com -p supersecret
scripts.services: docker compose -f ../../infrastructure/docker-compose.yml up -d db redis backend
scripts.seed:services: docker compose -f ../../infrastructure/docker-compose.yml exec backend npm run seed
